Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "This command will set, reset and clear all skills on the target body.\\r\\nIf the target is in the same room you are in, you can ignore the quotation, otherwise it is required.\\r\\n"

"+upskills clear '\ - Saves, clears and resets all skills on a character to starting character creation level.\\r\\n+upskills twink '\ - Saves and sets all skills to 10 on character.\\r\\n+upskills recall '\ - Resets all skills to previous saved levels.\\r\\n+upskills stupid '\ - Removes all skills and all saved skills from character.\\r\\n"
